Got these as an alternative to some everyday earrings. They can be used for dressing up or just to spruce up an otherwise casual outfit like a tracksuit. 评论概述: A bit smaller than the picture made it look, but really plenty big enough
评论详情: These earrings looked large enough in the picture that I actually worried they might end up being too heavy to wear for long. I was quite surprised when I actually opened the box and saw how (relatively) small they are. See the photo to get an idea of their size relative to my head/ear.  I really like their simplicity and the fact that they are unusual and interesting. However, I am knocking off a star because one of the posts is noticeably bent at the very tip, and it made getting it into my earlobe a bit tricky and time-consuming. Despite that, I like that a lot (once I get that one in), and I'm pleased with them overall.
These are very cute earrings.  I hope they keep their color and don’t tarnish quickly.
Arrived on time and as described. Nice quality item. Pictures do not do the item justice. Lightweight and will not weigh the ears down. The backing is gold and not the usual plastic. Good buy.

When I first tried these on I didn’t like them, but once I paired them with a work outfit I totally changed my mind! They’re great for when you want a larger earring but don’t want anything too statement-y. I’d describe my personal style as minimalism with an edge, and these fit that perfectly. They’re also lightweight, which is a must for me.

I am very pleased with these earrings! They are as described, a simple geometric shape. BEST PART - they are incredibly lightweight. I usually wear studs so my ears get itchy/sore with heavy earrings. I felt like I still had studs in while wearing these for hours. The stud part does seem to be a surgical steel which sometimes bothers my ears, however I've had no issues with this metal (use your discretion if you have allergies).  The second lower chain loops into the top chain but isn't fixed to it which allows for slight movement. I think this makes it more elegant and less "costume jewelry look". It's a nice light gold. I don't expect them to last decades, but I especially love them for the price!
I received these in the mail with a random pair of pearl earrings. These things are enormous and not the best quality you can probably find better elsewhere
Polish gold dangle is not heavy. The clean design would work for dress or casual. These earrings feel and look designer.

评论概述: Look high-end in size and simplicity – Beautiful and funky!
评论详情: These earrings are so nice looking.  They really do have a high-end feel and look to them with their size and simplistic design.  Versatile too – wear for a night out, at the office, wherever and whenever.  They are made well and the each one comes with two earring backs so that is nice.  The backs hold well but with my ears I may switch to the plastic disk backs so that they feel a bit more stable on my puffy lobe.  But they do not really hang forward with the backs they come with – as some earrings do.  Easy to get on and easy to take off.  Very simple in design but sometimes simple makes them all the more fabulous.  They really do look funky and eye-catching!  They also included another free pair with them. These very large pearlescent partial globes.  They look much better in person as opposed to my pictures.  Neat!I hope that you have found my review helpful. : )  Enjoy your day! : )

Wore these for a night out and they both feel sturdy and well made but also didn't hurt my ears after wearing them for several hours. Great accessory to add something extra to any outfit, I'll definitely have them in heavy rotation.
